name: Diner Disaster - A non accommodated nightmare
name_original: Diner Disaster - A non accommodated nightmare
description:
A short 3D cooking game by Ethan Malmstrom and Caden Stefanelli:

WASD TO MOVE

SPACE TO INTERACT

USE MOUSE ON MINIGAMES

Start at the dough station on the left-right above the generator if you are confused on where to go, go to the map at the top left below the oven

This game is a half-game and half simulation of what it can feel like to have a mental quirk in an environment not friendly to you. This game is our submission into games for change 2022!

WARNING DO NOT RELOAD THE BROWSER! IF YOU WANT TO REPLAY THE GAME PLEASE LOAD THE WEBSITE IN A NEW TAB!
